sentences.english: When we lived in the countryside, we had to send away for many things we needed.
sentences.chinese: 我們住在鄉下時，許多東西都得匯錢到外地函購。

sentences.english: We had to send away to the factory for spare parts.
sentences.chinese: 我們只得向工廠函購零件。

sentences.english: Teacher tells the children how to write away for a puzzle book .
sentences.chinese: 老師告訴孩子們如何寫信函購一本智力測驗的書。

sentences.english: I sent away for some rare books.
